title: Best of The Herd: 03/20/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 03/20/2019
description:
Doug Gottlieb fills in for Colin and explains why the Lakers took another big loss last night, this time from Doc Rivers.  He says Zion Williamson has done something impossible at Duke.  Plus, 3x Super Bowl Champion Mark Schlereth talks about how the Cardinals are handling the Kyler Murray situation and why free agent signings are usually overrated.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
